commands.name: az scvmm vmmserver inventory-item list
commands.summary: Retrieve a list of inventory items present in a vmmserver.
examples: az scvmm vmmserver inventory-item list --subscription contoso-sub --resource-group contoso-rg --vmmserver contoso-vmmserver

commands.name: az scvmm vmmserver inventory-item show
commands.summary: Get details of an inventory item present in a vmmserver.
examples: az scvmm vmmserver inventory-item show --subscription contoso-sub --resource-group contoso-rg --vmmserver contoso-vmmserver --inventory-item 01234567-0123-0123-0123-0123456789ab
